title: pytorch does not compatible with caffe2
body_html:
Issue description

I seem not able to import torch together with caffe2 in the same process.

Code example

>>> import torch
>>> from caffe2.python import workspace

or

>>> from caffe2.python import workspace
>>> import torch

System Info

Collecting environment information...
PyTorch version: 0.5.0a0+08daed4
Is debug build: No
CUDA used to build PyTorch: 9.0.176

body:
## Issue description

I seem not able to import torch together with caffe2 in the same process.

## Code example

```
>>> import torch
>>> from caffe2.python import workspace
```
or
```
>>> from caffe2.python import workspace
>>> import torch
```

## System Info
Collecting environment information...
PyTorch version: 0.5.0a0+08daed4
Is debug build: No
CUDA used to build PyTorch: 9.0.176

OS: Ubuntu 16.04.4 LTS
GCC version: (Ubuntu 5.4.0-6ubuntu1~16.04.10) 5.4.0 20160609
CMake version: version 3.5.1

Python version: 2.7
Is CUDA available: Yes
CUDA runtime version: Could not collect

GPU 7: GeForce GTX 1080 Ti

cuDNN version: Probably one of the following:

/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/libcudnn_static.a
